title: issue tracker: "Defect report from user" uses "hg pull -u"
body:
"Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks." Go issue tracker "Defect report from
user" template.

The "hg pull -u" command doesn't always update to the latest revision. To
always use the latest revision, the message should ask for the "hg pull &&
hg update default" commands.
